maiBlocks.bioText:
AÜRT cohabits with a more informal concept called MA'I.

It is a tribute to the three techniques of making drinks, each one represented with a thematic table: Infusion, Fermentation and Distillation.

We want to recover the importance that the service of drinks has had in the big hotels throughout history, but reinterpreting their ceremony under a particular gastronomic vision.The drink proposal is completed with a culinary offer inspired by the territorial identity.

maiBlocks.title: Fermentation
maiBlocks.bioText: Concept that bets on wines that treasure authenticity, typicality and naturalness.

maiBlocks.title: Infusion
maiBlocks.bioText: We propose elaborations and balanced combinations under a great technical rigor.

maiBlocks.title: What does MA'I mean?
maiBlocks.bioText: Artur Martínez always signs as 'i'am'. MA'I is I'aM backwards. Another relationship with his personality. But it also honors his professional origins, since they are the sum of the initials of Maite, Arturo and Isabel: mother, father and grandmother, from whom he inherited the culinary passion and with whom he walked his first steps as a chef. He liked his ambiguity ('Never') and that it is a word with three letters, like the three thematic tables that confirm the concept. It was also short and forceful, and its apostrophe granted a symbolic companion to the umlaut of Aürt.
